DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: You’ve got nothing to do, huh?

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: But don’t worry, I’ve come to fix that.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I think you’ve already had a chance to meet the native inhabitants of this place.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I’m not sure I created them to be so aggressive... but I suppose that makes things more interesting.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: Prove to me that you’re stronger than my previous creations and bring me 5 claws by the next night.
